content:
My family and I are planning a beach vacation in the most famous island of the USA and we need to know the weather conditions. Can you provide us with daily weather forecasts for the next 7 days at our destination, including the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation probability? We would also like to see images of the beaches at our destination.
Begin!

Excellent task! I'll break this down into several steps. First, I'll determine the most famous island in the USA, which I believe is Hawaii (specifically Waikiki Beach in Honolulu). Then I'll search for beach images and get some contextual information.

Thought: I'll start by searching for images of Waikiki Beach to confirm and visualize the destination.

name: search_image_for_google_search_json
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'success', 'items': [{'title': 'The 2-mile long Waik\u012bk\u012b Beach: How to choose your favorite stretch', 'thumbnailImageUrl': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSSg5h6eXMgXfwyUOsWmPfKvg29T7xxyecqKSUufgE3T09wvj8a&s', 'originalImageUrl': 'https://loveoahu.org/wp-content/uploads/waikiki-beach-diamond-head-crater.jpg', 'contextLink': 'https://loveoahu.org/beaches/waikiki-beach/', 'height': 1367, 'width': 2000, 'size': '270KB'}, {'title': 'Why is Waik\u012bk\u012b Beach Famous? - Waikiki Shopping Plaza', 'thumbnailImageUrl': 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS2FJmquMUAz_z2-_JF33OB4vaVRa5pjZ4jZoeLQLsunZGj0Q6z&s', 'originalImageUrl': 'https://waikikishoppingplaza.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/why-waikiki-is-famous-min-1024x682.jpg', 'contextLink': 'https://waikikishoppingplaza.com/why-is-waikiki-beach-famous/', 'height': 682, 'width': 1024, 'size': '137KB'}, {'title': 'Best Beaches on Oahu | Top Spots for Sun and Surf', 'thumbnailI...
Thought: The images confirm Waikiki Beach is our destination. Now I'll do a web search to get more context about weather information.

function.arguments: {"q": "Waikiki Beach Hawaii current weather forecast next 7 days temperature humidity wind precipitation", "num": 7}
function.name: search_web_for_google_search_json

name: search_web_for_google_search_json
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'success', 'items': [{'title': '10-Day Weather Forecast for Honolulu, HI', 'htmlTitle': '10-Day Weather Forecast for Honolulu, HI', 'link': 'https://weather.com/weather/tenday/l/Honolulu+HI?canonicalCityId=f1fea4541b1386236377959c9a6addd92ce096d51fc2c2254cfb2596910c8965', 'displayLink': 'weather.com', 'snippet': '', 'htmlSnippet': ''}, {'title': '7-Day Forecast 21.27N 157.84W', 'htmlTitle': '7-Day Forecast 21.27N 157.84W', 'link': 'https://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?textField1=21.28&textField2=-157.83&site=hfo&FcstType=text', 'displayLink': 'forecast.weather.gov', 'snippet': '', 'htmlSnippet': ''}, {'title': 'Waikiki, HI Weather Forecast', 'htmlTitle': 'Waikiki, HI Weather Forecast', 'link': 'https://www.accuweather.com/en/us/waikiki/96815/weather-forecast/2635634', 'displayLink': 'www.accuweather.com', 'snippet': '', 'htmlSnippet': ''}, {'title': '7-Day Forecast 21.29N 157.86W', 'htmlTitle': '7-Day Forecast 21.29N 157.86W', 'link': 'https://forecast.weather.gov/zi...
Thought: While I found weather forecast links, I cannot directly access their content. I'll compile the most relevant information for the user.

function.arguments:
{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "🏖️ Waikiki Beach, Hawaii - Your Beach Vacation Destination!

Beach Images: I've found beautiful images of Waikiki Beach showcasing its stunning 2-mile stretch of golden sand, crystal clear waters, and the iconic Diamond Head crater in the background.

Weather Forecast Guidance:
While I cannot provide exact real-time temperatures, here's what you should expect in Waikiki:
• Average Daytime Temperature: 80-85°F (26-29°C)
• Average Nighttime Temperature: 70-75°F (21-24°C)
• Humidity: Typically 60-70%
• Wind Speed: 10-15 mph (moderate, refreshing sea breeze)
• Precipitation Probability: 20-30% (brief tropical showers possible)

Recommendations:
1. Pack lightweight, breathable clothing
2. Bring sunscreen (high SPF)
3. Pack a light rain jacket
4. Stay hydrated

For precise, current forecasts, I recommend checking:
• Weather.com
• AccuWeather
• National Weather Service (forecast.weather.gov)

Enjoy your tropical Hawaiian beach vacation! 🌴☀️🌊"}
function.name: Finish
